tweet_text:
@GretchenKoch @ETVPod In this context - essentially an ad, where it's a pull-quote - I think they shouldn't have used the quote at all.

That doesn't mean I don't think the quote can't be used elsewhere (like part of an essay). But it's really not suited for this sort of usage anymore.
text_en: In this context - essentially an ad, where it's a pull-quote - I think they shouldn't have used the quote at all. That doesn't mean I don't think the quote can't be used elsewhere (like part of an essay). But it's really not suited for this sort of usage anymore.

tweet_text:
Day 30:
Teaching others simply gives you more authority.
When you teach others, you get to learn things faster and make great content!

Try Richard Feynman's learning/studying technique to learn how to learn fast. 

https://t.co/1BXm5UYwSz 

#30DaysofEfficiency
